availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Thomas S. Kern (Lyon / Caldwell co. blacksmith )

body.p: Lyon County, Kentucky, blacksmith. Tennessee native. Married to Nancy Oliver Kern in Caldwell County, Kentucky, on May 25, 1850. Father of Missouri E. Kern, John J. Kern, Samuel T. Kern, William H. Kern, Joseph F. Kern, James M. Kern, Jefferson Kern, and Susan Jane Kern. Blacksmith in Caldwell County in 1850. Blacksmith in Lyon County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell County, District 1, p. 339A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Lyon County, p. 718.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell County, Harmony, p. 460B.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Caldwell County Marriages, Film #000851644, p. 277.
Kentucky Death Certificates, 1911-1965, Kentucky Office of Vital Statistics, KDLA, Frankfort, KY, File #15494.
